urls.description: Do you want to log in or join Facebook? What's the connection between Coronavirus and ARDS https:// www.webmd.com/ lung/ ards-acute-respi ratory-distress -syndrome.......So how does ARDS actually damage your lungs?' Fluid leaks from small blood vessels and collects in tiny air sacs in your lungs so they can’t fill with enough air.'' Most importantly, patients who are suffering from ARDS end up having damage to the walls of the air sacs in their lungs — the ones that help oxygen pass through into our red
